member.name: T:CustomControls.ActiveDocumentRoutedCommand
member.summary: Represents a command with information to find associated resources when a document is inactive.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ActiveDocumentRoutedCommand.InactiveHeaderKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use to find a localized menu header in standard resource files when a document is inactive.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ActiveDocumentRoutedCommand.InactiveToolTipKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use to find a localized tooltip in standard resource files when a document is inactive.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ActiveDocumentRoutedCommand.InactiveMenuHeader
member.summary: Gets the localized menu header when a document is inactive.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ActiveDocumentRoutedCommand.InactiveButtonToolTip
member.summary: Gets the localized tooltip when a document is inactive.

member.name: T:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference
member.summary: Represents an object that can extract string and icon resources from an assembly specified by name.

member.name: P:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.Default
member.summary: Gets the default .

member.name: M:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.Initialize
member.summary: Fills the cache when called for the first times. Does nothing on subsequent calls.

member.name: P:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly.

member.name: P:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.ResourceExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the extension of resource files to find within the assembly.

member.name: P:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.IconPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to icon resources within the assembly.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a localized string from the assembly by its resource name.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.GetImageSource(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a localized image source from the assembly by its resource name.

member.name: F:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.InitResourceAssembly
member.summary: Cached location of the assembly.

member.name: F:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.InitResourceSource
member.summary: Cached location of a type used to find resources in the assembly.

member.name: F:CustomControls.CommandResourceReference.InitResourceManager
member.summary: Cached location of a used to find strings in the assembly.

member.name: T:CustomControls.ExtendedRoutedCommand
member.summary: Represents a command with information to find associated resources.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedRoutedCommand.CommandGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets the this command is associated to.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedRoutedCommand.MenuHeader
member.summary: Gets the name of the resource for menu headers using this command.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedRoutedCommand.ImageSource
member.summary: Gets the source of the resource for buttons using this command.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedRoutedCommand.ButtonToolTip
member.summary: Gets the name of the resource for tooltips on controls using this command.

member.name: T:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand
member.summary: Represents a command that extracts associated resources from localized standard resources.

member.name: F:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.ApplicationNamePattern
member.summary: The pattern found in localized resource that can be replaced with the name of the application using the command.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.Reference
member.summary: Gets or sets the this command is associated to.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.HeaderKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use to find a localized menu header in standard resource files.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.ToolTipKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use to find a localized tooltip in standard resource files.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.IconKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to use to find an image in standard resource files.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.MenuHeader
member.summary: Gets the localized menu header.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.ButtonToolTip
member.summary: Gets the localized tooltip.

member.name: P:CustomControls.LocalizedRoutedCommand.ImageSource
member.summary: Gets the localized image.

member.name: T:CustomControls.SolutionCommandGroup
member.summary: Represents an object that indicates if a feature is enabled, and therefore if controls associated to this feature should be shown.

member.name: P:CustomControls.SolutionCommandGroup.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the feature is enabled. True, the feature is enabled and commands associated to that feature should be used. False, the feature is disabled and commands associated to that feature should not be used.

member.name: P:CustomControls.SolutionCommandGroup.Default
member.summary: Gets the default .

member.name: T:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton
member.summary: Represents a button with additional properties indicating if it should be displayed in a tool bar.

member.name: F:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.ReferenceProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.Reference
member.summary: Gets or sets The reference to an assembly where to find resources associated to the button. Used when the command does not have enough information to locate these resources. For instance, if the command is one of the ApplicationCommands. Can be null otherwise.

member.name: F:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.IsCheckableProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.IsCheckable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can check the button as visible. True, the user can check the button as visible or uncheck it as hidden in the tool bar. False, the button is always visible.

member.name: M:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.OnIsCheckableChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the dependency property is changed on .
member.param: The object that had its property modified.

member.summary: Called when the dependency property is changed.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.IsDefaultActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the default setting is True. True, the default setting for the property is True. False, the default setting for the property is False.

member.summary: Called when the dependency property is changed on .
member.param: The object that had its property modified.

member.summary: Called when the dependency property is changed.

member.name: F:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.IsActiveProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarButton.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the the button is visible. True, the button is visible in the tool bar. False, the button is hidden.

member.summary: Called when the dependency property is changed on .

member.name: T:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem
member.summary: Represents a menu item with additional properties indicating if it should be displayed in a menu.

member.name: F:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem.CanShowProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem.CanShow
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button can be shown in any menu. True, the button can be shown in any menu. False, the button should not appear in any menu.
Note: this allows to specify the menu generic visibility when multi binding is used to decide if it is visible.

member.name: M:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class.

member.name: M:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem.OverrideAncestorMetadata
member.summary: Overrides metadata associated to the ancestor control with new ones associated to this control specifically.

member.name: M:CustomControls.ExtendedToolBarMenuItem.OverrideMetadataDefaultStyleKey
member.summary: Overrides the DefaultStyleKey metadata associated to the ancestor control with a new one associated to this control specifically.
